title: Guide on how to beat the censor
body:
https://www.cs.tut.fi/~jkorpela/chars/spaces.html

Put a no width space between the letters, gg.

Now someone buy me a dominos pizza.

> [{quoted}](name=Maya Fey,realm=NA,application-id=mNBeEEkI,discussion-id=2jIeOLAZ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-08-31T18:35:30.058+0000)
>
> Copy and paste between the foo and bar if you don't wanna use the code.
> 
> To test if you actually copied it try pasting it into google.
